sources.title: SiTime Company Profile | Management and Employees List - Datanyze
sources.snippet: SiTime Profile and History. Founded in 2004, Sitime Corporation develops silicon-based timing solutions. The Company manufacturers oscillators, clock generators, and embedded resonators used for ethernet switches, computing devices, graphics cards, disk drives, mobile phones, and subscriber identity module cards. Sitime is based in Santa Clara, CA.
